casebody.data:
David K. EVERSON, and Patricia M. Everson
v.
Douglas E. WRIGHT. No. 146P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Patricia M. Everson, Pro Se. David K. Everson, Pro Se. Douglas E. Wright, Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of March 2006 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."
